chat.name: Ranbir

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: No. I wasn't crying. It was just the dust of air particles which brought water to my eyes.

chat.name: Ranbir
chat.message: You can't lie in front of me. I can recognise your lies. And you know that. Don't you?

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: yes I do know that. You please don't exert on yourself. You are right I was crying but I was just crying.

chat.message: Did I do something wrong with you that made you cry?

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: please don't use that â€˜please' word . I am telling . Actually the thing is I had brought tiffin for us. I realised that you haven't ate a single piece of food since morning so I brought your favourite dish but you refuse to eat it since you realised that it may be oily though you liked it. Due to my mistake of bringing brinjal you have to starve for the rest of the day. I was feeling so guilty of not able to satisfy your hunger. It was all mistake. I am very sorry dear.

chat.name: Ranbir
chat.message: Will you please stop being so cute?

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: Are you even listening? I am saying that I am very sorry. How's that cute?

chat.name: Ranbir

chat.name: Ranbir
chat.message: OK but I am sorry dear.

chat.name: Ranbir
chat.message: How can anyone love someone this much?

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: (Blushing)

chat.name: Ranbir
chat.message: (Blushing too)

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: How you know that I love you alot when I don't even say that?

chat.name: Ranbir
chat.message: The one who was herself starving from morning just to have a lunch with me and is still starving, didn't even thought of her hunger and was crying just because she was unable to satisfy my hunger. Isn't that cute?

chat.name: Alisha
chat.message: (blushing) if you say it may be.
